last_episode_to_air.name: HIGHEST
last_episode_to_air.overview: Let the banquet of slaughter begin in the season finale.

name: The Eminence in Shadow
original_name: 陰の実力者になりたくて！
overview: Shadowbrokers are those who go unnoticed, posing as unremarkable people, when in truth, they control everything from behind the scenes. Sid wants to be someone just like that more than anything, and something as insignificant as boring reality isn’t going to get in his way! He trains in secret every single night, preparing for his eventual rise to power—only to denied his destiny by a run-of-the-mill (yet deadly) traffic accident. But when he wakes up in a another world and suddenly finds himself at the head of an actual secret organization doing battle with evil in the shadows, he’ll finally get a chance to act out all of his delusional fantasies!

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Even in his past life, Cid's dream wasn't to become a protagonist or a final boss. He'd rather lie low as a minor character until it's prime time to reveal he's a mastermind...or at least, do the next best thing-pretend to be one! And now that he's been reborn into another world, he's ready to set the perfect conditions to live out his dreams to the fullest. Armed with his overactive imagination, Cid jokingly recruits members to his organization and makes up a whole backstory about an evil cult that they need to take down. Well, as luck would have it, these imaginary adversaries turn out to be the real deal-and everyone knows the truth but him!

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Everything has been going according to plan, but the hour of awakening draws near. Cid Kagenou and Shadow Garden investigate the Lawless City, a cesspool where the red moon hangs low in the sky and three powerful monarchs rule the streets. The true draw for Cid, however, is one who can draw blood–the Blood Queen, a vampire who has slumbered in her coffin for eons. Her awakening approaches, and Cid could finally face a day of reckoning.

episodes.name: The Hated Classmate
episodes.overview: Akane copes with her trauma by being popular and working hard to make people like her, but one boy in her class doesn’t care about her at all. That bothers her to no end.

episodes.name: Shadow Garden Is Born
episodes.overview: Reincarnated as the son of Baron Kagenou, Cid bides his time as Background Character A while preparing for the day he can finally become the Eminence in Shadow!

episodes.name: Fencer Ordinaire
episodes.overview: The princess is supposed to reject the background character’s confession, not accept it — since when did Cid become a rom-com protagonist?

episodes.name: Sadism's Rewards
episodes.overview: The mistake those with power always make is believing that they are the ones in control.

episodes.name: I Am...
episodes.overview: Cid is not facing a minion but a would-be Knight of the Rounds. Normally, that is cause for concern, but an atomic bomb has no reason to fear the gnashing of a lowly pest.

episodes.name: Pretenders
episodes.overview: While Iris seeks a bright mind to study an artifact, Cid visits a popular store. Meanwhile, in the dark corners of the city, someone commits murders in Shadow Garden’s name!

episodes.name: A Fencing Tournament of Intrigue and Bloodshed
episodes.overview: Cid gets a report from Nu about powerful cult members lurking in the Royal Capital. Too bad he’s too distracted about the upcoming fencing tournament to notice.

episodes.name: Dark Knight Academy Under Attack
episodes.overview: Cid sacrificed his life to save Rose. At least, that’s what everyone thinks. Unbeknownst to anyone else, Cid survived exactly as planned, and now his counterattack can begin.

episodes.name: The End of a Lie
episodes.overview: When the students fight back, Shadow Garden joins the fray as their reinforcements. Amidst the chaos, Cid confronts the Gaunt Knight.

episodes.name: The Sacred Land, City of Deception
episodes.overview: Cid heads to Lindwurm in response to a summons from Alpha, but he is not the only one traveling there; the annual Goddess’ Trial is quickly approaching.

episodes.name: The Goddess' Trial
episodes.overview: The curtain rises on the Goddess’ Trial. When Cid is unwittingly called into the arena, he transforms into Shadow and faces none other than Aurora, the Witch of Calamity.

episodes.name: The Truth Within the Memories
episodes.overview: The door to the Sanctuary opens and Alpha strides through it, intending to expose the Cult’s grave secrets. Meanwhile, Cid also enters the Sanctuary and reunites with… Aurora?

episodes.name: A Bloody Showdown as an Offering to Annihilation
episodes.overview: Alpha faces off against an empowered Nelson in a vicious battle. Elsewhere, Cid and Aurora reach the Sanctuary's core, but a door only a hero can open blocks their path.

episodes.name: Your Lie, Your Wish
episodes.overview: Cid’s victory is short-lived when Nelson counters with his new magic. Meanwhile, Alexia convinces Rose and Natsume to form an alliance to uncover the truth of their world.

episodes.name: The Strongest Weakest Man
episodes.overview: Only the strongest warriors can advance in the prestigious Bushin Festival, but one contestant proves himself a feeble and mundane man with no talent. Why is he competing?

episodes.name: Unseen Intentions
episodes.overview: Princess Rose flees to the north of the Royal Capital. The Oriana Kingdom wants to handle it internally as a “purely domestic” matter.

episodes.name: Moonlight That Pierces the Darkness
episodes.overview: Cid recollects piano lessons from his past life — what impact does this have on his present? Meanwhile, Epsilon’s performance sets the soundtrack for something else...

episodes.name: Betting on a Moment
episodes.overview: Cid and Claire receive an invitation to a tournament. At the festivities, Cid receives more attention than a background character desires.

episodes.name: Dancing Puppet
episodes.overview: Doem tries to make war with Midgar. Meanwhile, the match between Jimina and Iris begins.

episodes.name: Advent of the Demon
episodes.overview: Provoked by the fight between Shadow and Beatrix, Iris joins the fray. An intense battle progresses across the Royal Capital. Meanwhile, Rose runs into Alpha...

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Even in his past life, Cid's dream wasn't to become a protagonist or a final boss. He'd rather lie low as a minor character until it's prime time to reveal he's a mastermind...or at least, do the next best thing-pretend to be one! And now that he's been reborn into another world, he's ready to set the perfect conditions to live out his dreams to the fullest. Armed with his overactive imagination, Cid jokingly recruits members to his organization and makes up a whole backstory about an evil cult that they need to take down. Well, as luck would have it, these imaginary adversaries turn out to be the real deal-and everyone knows the truth but him!

episodes.name: The Lawless City
episodes.overview: Cid and his sister Claire venture to the huge slum known as the “Lawless City.” There, Cid gets caught up in the commotion caused by the Red Moon.

episodes.name: The Haven
episodes.overview: The moon is red. The frenzy has begun. Shadow is introduced to power players in Lawless City. Meanwhile, Mary and Claire run into Juggernaut.

episodes.name: The Hour of Awakening
episodes.overview: The night the red moon rises, the Blood Queen Elisabeth makes her return.

episodes.name: Mask of Falsehood
episodes.overview: The Mitsugoshi Company is doing great, all thanks to Gamma! However, the biggest crisis imaginable rears its ugly head.

episodes.name: He Who Pulls the Strings
episodes.overview: Alpha and Gamma carefully plot not take any actions that would implicate Mitsugoshi's connection to Shadow Garden. Meanwhile, John Smith has a plot of his own.

episodes.name: John Smith
episodes.overview: John Smith's skill is leagues above even the most skilled fighters! Who is this mysterious person?

episodes.name: Something Precious
episodes.overview: The Major Corporate Alliance has forced closure of all their storefronts, bringing the citizens' unrest to its peak. But can Shadow Garden weather the storm?

episodes.name: The Dragon’s Tears
episodes.overview: With Cid missing and things getting hot, the Shadow Garden springs into action. At the Mitsugoshi Hot Springs Land that is!

episodes.name: The Key
episodes.overview: On the way to the Kingdom of Oriana, Cid is also on a journey of self-discovery and reflection. He feels like something's missing. Is he imagining it?

episodes.name: Caged Bird
episodes.overview: Did Princess Rose Oriana take it upon herself to join up with the enemy? Not even the Seven Shadows have authority over this matter anymore.

episodes.name: Determination
episodes.overview: With Princess Rose’s hands tied as Perv has taking her mother hostage, the Eminence in Shadow must move to free the captive himself.

episodes.name: HIGHEST
episodes.overview: Let the banquet of slaughter begin in the season finale.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Everything has been going according to plan, but the hour of awakening draws near. Cid Kagenou and Shadow Garden investigate the Lawless City, a cesspool where the red moon hangs low in the sky and three powerful monarchs rule the streets. The true draw for Cid, however, is one who can draw blood–the Blood Queen, a vampire who has slumbered in her coffin for eons. Her awakening approaches, and Cid could finally face a day of reckoning.
